attributes.action: Request that all titles in regards to marital status are changed for a Woman
attributes.additional_details: To make all women automatically become Mrs at 18 just as a man becomes Mr at 18
attributes.background: We feel that titles for women should be the same as men, where your title becomes Mrs at an age rather than in regards to you’re marital status. We feel that currently it’s gender-bias and sexist, highlighting the need for change in how different genders are portrayed in a modern society

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on what titles people want to use with their names are a matter for individuals and not required by the Government or Parliament.
